'''Score''' is a value that can be used to create mods with an arcade-like feeling. It can be manipulated from ACS with [[ACS actor properties|APROP_Score]], increased by {{Class|ScoreItem}}s, and used in [[DECORATE expressions]] with the score variable.
The [[alternate HUD]] will show the player's current score if {{c|hud_showscore}} is true.
[[Category:Glossary]][[Category:Features]]
